title: The 5 Steps to Achieve Healing: The perfect supplement to The Encyclopedia of Ailments and Diseases
description: With respect to healing, it appears that we are not all equal. In fact, certain persons heal, while others do not. Why? Is there a process that promotes healing? This book offers me some enlightening insight in my questionings about healing. I will discover not only the available means to help me achieve it, but especially the essential steps that will afford me the possibility of getting there. The five steps I will discover in this book will enable me to open up and reclaim my power over myself. I will become conscious of the fact that I am the key to my own healing process, whatever means I choose to use in order to achieve it.
